item.title: 普拉博沃的民粹主义预算引发对收入目标的质疑
item.description: 据分析人士称，印尼总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）的民粹主义支出承诺以及没有计划采取新的税收措施，使印尼面临着超过明年预算赤字目标的风险。【原文：Indonesia risks blowing past its budget deficit target for next year, according to analysts, citing President Prabowo Subianto’s populist spending promises and no plans for new tax measures.】

item.title: 铁矿石随必和必拓业绩下滑，中国需求疲软成焦点
item.description: 铁矿石跌幅扩大，矿业巨头必和必拓集团（BHP Group Ltd. ）报告称，由于中国需求疲软和全球供应充足，该公司利润下降。【原文：Iron ore extended declines as mining giant BHP Group Ltd. reported falling profits on softer Chinese demand and plentiful global supply.】

item.title: 肯尼亚考虑回购 35 亿美元本币债券
item.description: 知情人士称，肯尼亚政府计划在国内债务到期前回购多达 4,550 亿先令（35 亿美元）的国内债务，从而扩大一项更灵活地处理贷款偿还的计划。【原文：Kenya’s government plans to buy back as much as 455 billion shillings ($3.5 billion) of domestic debt before it matures, people with knowledge of the matter said, expanding a program to handle loan repayment more flexibly.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）访问塞内加尔，探寻重要新计划的线索
item.description: 随着国际货币基金组织代表团本周抵达塞内加尔，投资者们正在关注这个西非国家是否将更接近于获得新的资金，以稳定其紧张的公共财政。【原文：As an International Monetary Fund mission arrives in Senegal this week, investors are watching to see if the West African nation will inch closer to securing new funding to stabilize its strained public finances.】

item.title: 越南启动雄心勃勃的项目以刺激经济增长
item.description: 本周二，越南启动了大规模的基础设施建设，全国约 250 个项目破土动工或举行落成典礼，政府正努力促进经济增长。【原文：Vietnam launched a major infrastructure push with the groundbreaking or inauguration of some 250 projects nationwide on Tuesday, as the government seeks to boost economic growth.】

item.title: 日本 20 年期债券销售需求低于 12 个月平均水平
item.description: 日本 20 年期国债拍卖吸引的需求弱于 12 个月的平均水平，反映出在政府支出增加和减税等财政风险下，投资者对期限较长的债务持谨慎态度。【原文：Japan’s 20-year government bond auction drew demand that was weaker than its 12-month average, reflecting investor caution about longer dated debt amid fiscal risks like higher government spending and tax cuts.】

item.title: 债券跌势延续，中国加大短期现金注入力度
item.description: 中国央行周二向金融系统注入了大量现金，此举有望稳定因投资者转向股票而承压的债券。【原文：China’s central bank added a substantial amount of cash into the financial system on Tuesday, in a move that’s seen stabilizing bonds that have come under pressure from investors migrating into equities.】

item.title: 港元因股市流入和 Hibor 飙升而反弹
item.description: 受股票流入和本地借贷成本飙升的提振，港元兑美元自 5 月份以来首次走强至固定交易区间的中间位置。【原文：The Hong Kong dollar strengthened to the middle of its fixed trading range against the greenback for the first time since May, buoyed by stock inflows and a surge in local borrowing costs.】

item.title: 韩国银行利率调整前韩国家庭债务创 2021 年以来最大增幅
item.description: 在抵押贷款激增的推动下，韩国上一季度的家庭债务以 2021 年以来最快的速度增长，这可能会在韩国央行下周召开政策会议之前增加其担忧。【原文：South Korea’s household debt last quarter expanded at the quickest pace since 2021, fueled by a jump in mortgage lending, likely adding to concerns at the Bank of Korea ahead of its policy meeting next week.】

item.title: 与中国的紧张关系有所缓和，印度国防类股滞涨
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 加巴德称英国放弃对美国人开设苹果 "后门 "的要求
item.description: 美国国家情报总监图尔西-加巴德周一在 X 上发表文章称，苹果公司将不再被迫向英国政府提供所谓的美国用户数据后门。【原文：Apple Inc. will no longer be forced to provide a so-called backdoor to American users’ data to the UK government, US Director of National Intelligence Tulsi Gabbard said in a post on X on Monday.】

item.title: 特斯拉为新款 Model Y 定价，希望赢得中国家庭的青睐
item.description: 特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc. ）将其更新版六座 Model Y 运动型多功能车的定价与本土竞争对手李书福汽车公司（Li Auto Inc.【原文：Tesla Inc. priced its updated, six-seat Model Y sport utility vehicle in the same range as local rival Li Auto Inc.’s extended-range L8 model, to win over middle-class families in China’s hyper-competitive market.】

item.title: 小米早期支持者启明将中国基金目标降至 6 亿美元
item.description: 启明创投（Qiming Venture Partners）将其针对中国人工智能和医疗保健初创企业的新基金规模削减了四分之一，降至6亿美元，这表明全球投资者对中国的科技领域仍持谨慎态度。【原文：Qiming Venture Partners is slashing its new fund targeting Chinese AI and healthcare startups by a quarter to $600 million, in a sign of lingering caution among global investors about the country’s tech scene.】

item.title: 香港建筑商侨福获得贷款延期，违约风险降低
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，香港开发商侨福集团有限公司（Parkview Group Ltd.）原定于 8 月 15 日到期的 9.4 亿美元贷款已获得三个月的延期，使其有更多时间与银行达成再融资协议。【原文：Hong Kong developer Parkview Group Ltd. has secured a three-month extension on a $940 million loan that was due Aug. 15, according to people familiar with the matter, giving it more time to work on a refinancing deal with banks.】

item.title: 巴西就竞争问题对主要大豆贸易商展开调查
item.description: 巴西反垄断监管机构将对 30 家大豆贸易商和两家行业协会进行调查，理由是谷物出口市场可能存在采购卡特尔。【原文：Brazil’s antitrust regulator will investigate 30 soybean traders and two industry associations, citing the possibility of a purchasing cartel in the grain-export market.】

item.title: 申银万国考虑迁回中国，为香港上市铺平道路
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，申银万国集团有限公司（Shein Group Ltd.）已考虑将其基地迁回中国，希望这有助于说服北京当局同意这家快速时尚零售商在香港上市的计划。【原文：Shein Group Ltd. has considered moving its base back to China in the hopes that it would help sway Beijing authorities to sign off on the fast-fashion retailer’s plans to go public in Hong Kong, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普关税被视为促进中国-全球南方贸易新秩序
item.description: 根据 S&P Global 的研究，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税战正在加速中国政府向被称为 "全球南方 "的发展中国家推进贸易和投资，有可能创造一个由中国企业主导的新贸易秩序。【原文：President Donald Trump’s tariff war is accelerating Beijing’s trade and investment push into developing nations known as the Global South, according to research by S&P Global, potentially creating a new trade order dominated by Chinese firms.】

item.title: S&P确认美国的信用评级基于关税收入和复原力
item.description: 美国全球评级公司（S&P Global Ratings）确认了美国在全球最大经济体中的评级，尽管最近的支出法案对美国财政造成了冲击，但美国仍能保持其信用优势，部分原因是关税收入将减轻美国的痛苦。【原文：The US can maintain its credit strength despite the fiscal hit of a recent spending bill, in part because tariff revenues will reduce the pain, according to S&P Global Ratings, which has affirmed its rating for the world’s largest economy.】

item.title: 摩根大通认为中国银行股因股息和利润率而上涨
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Chinese bank stocks are poised to rise in the second half, attracting dividend-seeking investors as the sector benefits from stabilizing net interest margins and growing fee income, according to a JPMorgan Chase & Co. analyst.】

item.title: 中国液化天然气需求低迷 广东改革面临更多障碍
item.description: 南方广东省进行的市场改革可能会减少发电厂对液化天然气的需求，中国不温不火的液化天然气进口面临进一步压力。【原文：China’s tepid imports of liquefied natural gas face further pressure after market reforms in the southern province of Guangdong that could cut demand for the fuel from power plants.】

item.title: VPBank 计划证券部门今年晚些时候在越南上市
item.description: 越南繁荣股份公司银行（Vietnam Prosperity JSC Bank）由三井住友金融集团（Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group）支持，据知情人士透露，该银行计划在今年晚些时候对其证券部门进行首次公开募股。【原文：Vietnam Prosperity JSC Bank, known as VPBank and backed by Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group, plans an initial public offering of its securities unit later this year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 韩国央行行长李明博在政策会议前强调贸易和经济增长风险
item.description: 韩国银行行长李昌镛（Rhee Chang Yong）在下周的政策决策前表示，韩国经济在第二季度出现反弹，但仍面临美国与主要经济体贸易谈判带来的高度不确定性。【原文：South Korea’s economy rebounded in the second quarter but still faces high levels of uncertainty from US trade talks with major economies, Bank of Korea Governor Rhee Chang Yong said ahead of next week’s policy decision.】

item.title: 流行超市盈利可能推动股价反弹，但股价仍低于目标价
item.description: Pop Mart 的上半年收益和前景评论可能会为投资者在长达数月的盘整后建立股票仓位提供新的理由。【原文：Pop Mart’s first-half earnings and outlook commentary may provide a fresh reason for investors to build positions in the shares after a months-long consolidation.】

item.title: 杰克逊霍尔会议前交易员追踪美国外交政策，黄金走势平稳
item.description: 交易员们权衡了美国主导的结束乌克兰战争的努力，并对美联储杰克逊霍尔年度会议进行了倒计时，这次会议可能会对可能的降息作出暗示，因此黄金变化不大。【原文：Gold was little changed as traders weighed US-led efforts to end the war in Ukraine, and counted down to the Federal Reserve’s annual Jackson Hole gathering, which may yield hints on possible rate cuts.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行第三次降息后消费者信心大增
item.description: 在储备银行今年第三次降息并表示有可能进一步放宽政策后，澳大利亚 8 月份的消费者信心大增。【原文：Australia’s consumer confidence surged in August after the Reserve Bank cut interest rates for the third time this year and signaled further easing is likely.】

item.title: 黄金反弹激发兴趣，在伊斯兰投资中获得牵引力
item.description: 在距离马来西亚首都一小时车程的一个小镇上，一个全新的、高度安全的保险库表明，为迎合伊斯兰教原则而设计的黄金产品和服务越来越受欢迎。【原文：In a small town an hour’s drive from Malaysia’s capital, a new, high-security vault illustrates the growing popularity of gold products and services designed to cater to Islamic principles.】

item.title: 新西兰人口增长速度为三年来最慢
item.description: 新西兰的人口增长速度是近三年来最慢的，因为经济复苏乏力，外国移民望而却步，促使更多的公民离开新西兰。【原文：New Zealand’s population is growing at the slowest pace in almost three years as a sluggish economic recovery deters foreign immigrants and prompts more citizens to depart.】

item.title: 巴西反击美国对其贸易行为的调查
item.description: 巴西坚决驳斥华盛顿关于不公平贸易做法的指控，称美国贸易代表就此展开的调查是对美国单边贸易法的非法利用。【原文：Brazil is forcefully rejecting Washington’s allegations of unfair trade practices, describing an investigation launched by the US Trade Representative into the matter as an illegitimate use of unilateral US trade law.】
